alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 8:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duchesne County through 830 PM MDT... At 802 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Duchesne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Upalco, Mountain Home, Arcadia, Neola, Talmage, Altonah, Cedarview and Utahn. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 83 and 92. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 57 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
